'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Hidden safely beneath the forth, this secret berth holds the most important ships of the Principi.

==Points of interest==
* Access to the Secret Dock is through the west door of the kitchen.
* A simple combat area. [[Lamond]] will ask you to wipe Benweth's crew out, so that he can steal the ship.
title: Secret dock
